Classes in org.teatrove.trove.log used by org.teatrove.trove.log
DailyLogStream
          An implementation of the IntervalLogStream with an interval of one day.
HourlyLogStream
          An implementation of the IntervalLogStream with an interval of one hour.
IntervalLogStream
          IntervalLogStream writes to an underlying OutputStream that is opened once per a specific time interval.
IntervalLogStream.Factory
           
Log
          General purpose logging class that operates using a hierarchy of Logs and an event model.
LogEvent
          LogEvent captures information that should be logged.
LogListener
          Simple event listener that can be added to a Log in order to receive LogEvents.

          General purpose logging class that operates using a hierarchy of Logs and an event model.
